    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack​(Player player)
        Spirit attacks against a Character

        Values of Spirit's attack/Character's defense are randomized from 0 to 2x of Spirit's strength, while Character's defense is half up to full value. Deal damage and subtract Character's hit point accordingly.

        With Spirit's attack being less than Character's defense, Regardless of level, and difference in damage. Spiritual damage equal to Spirit's level is dealt.

        Equipments' durabilities are decreased according Player.equipmentUsed().

        Overrides:
        attack in class Entity
        Parameters:
        opp - Character to attack against
